Lexington-Fayette.Clemens Heights, Lexington: Clemens Heights is a neighborhood in southwestern Lexington, Kentucky, United States. Its streets are all named after things associated with Mark Twain, whose real name was Samuel Clemens. Its boundaries are Old Higbee Mill Road to the north, Clemens Drive and Carevares Drive to the east, Copper Run Boulevard to the south, and Dogwood Park to the west.
